channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Dude ACTUALLY Withdraws From His 401(k) and Retires at 47
item.description: Did you know you can use your 401(k) to retire early? Yep, it’s possible. And today’s guest, Eric Cooper, is doing it at age 47! Most FIRE chasers search for […]

item.title: Xavier Niel replaces Coatue’s Laffont on board of TikTok parent ByteDance
item.description: French billionaire Xavier Niel is joining the board of directors of TikTok’s parent, ByteDance, the company told the South China Morning Post. It’s an interesting move as Niel isn’t a name that comes up very often for high-profile board positions. He is replacing Philippe Laffont, the founder of the New York-based investment firm Coatue Management, […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: How Efforts to Cut Long Prison Sentences Have Stalled
item.description: Crime victim advocates and conservative groups are resisting moves to revisit “truth-in-sentencing” laws.

item.title: After Analyzing the Largest Rental Markets—Here’s Where Prices Could Fall
item.description: Which markets are currently seeing a decline in effective rents, and which are currently experiencing high vacancy?

item.title: Clearview AI hit with its largest GDPR fine yet as Dutch regulator considers holding execs personally liable
item.description: The Netherlands' data protection authority has imposed a penalty of €30.5M on Clearview AI for GDPR violations. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: How a Massachusetts Cop Allegedly Groomed, Controlled and Killed Sandra Birchmore
item.description: Matthew Farwell met her in a police Explorer program. Prosecutors say he abused her for years before she became pregnant and he killed her.

item.title: High Cash Flow and Low Risk by Turning Tenants into Homeowners (Rent-to-Own)
item.description: Rent-to-own real estate can make you more cash flow, with less risk and fewer expenses, all while helping tenants become homeowners. But if it’s so good, why isn’t everyone doing […]

item.title: X lets you edit DMs — here is how to use the feature
item.description: X, the social network owned by Elon Musk, is finally rolling out one of the most sought-after features for direct messages: the ability to edit the message. Over the weekend, X made the edit message feature available to iOS users. One of the engineers at the company posted about the roll-out and said the edit […] © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: 5 Things to Know About How Survivors Get Incarcerated for Their Abusers’ Crimes
item.description: Little-known laws allow people to be punished for crimes they didn’t directly commit. Survivors of domestic violence are especially vulnerable.

item.title: Recession Indicators Go Off, Is the Housing Market Safe?
item.description: Recession fears are increasing. The stock market has taken substantial hits, housing inventory is climbing, and bank account balances are starting to fall. So, with more economic turmoil, we have […]

item.title: Laptop-leasing startup Fleet wants to become the IT companion for small companies
item.description: Fleet is launching several software services on top of its hardware-as-a-service proposition, from device management to cybersecurity and insurance. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: How a Drop in Border Crossings May Change the Presidential Campaign
item.description: The Democratic National Convention sought to address one of the party’s biggest weaknesses with voters.

item.title: The Rookie’s Cheat Sheet for Market Research (Find Where to Invest in 2024)
item.description: Choosing where to invest can be overwhelming. With thousands of real estate markets and endless data to wade through, it’s no wonder that so many rookies trip up on this […]

item.title: Ziina banks $22M as growth explodes for the UAE-based fintech for small businesses
item.description: The Dubai-based startup, which now counts 50,000 retail and business customers in the UAE, has netted $22 million led by Altos Ventures. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For personal use only.

item.title: How Prosecutors Fight Exonerations
item.description: As laws are passed to support the wrongfully convicted, some officials in the legal system push back.
